1353322.content:
Following the conclusion of the Yuuzhan Vong War, the planet of Corellia had become more and more rebellious and began seeking independence from the Galactic Alliance. While much of the galaxy had been ravaged by the Yuuzhan Vong War, Corellia had emerged relatively unscathed, but began to delay its conscription contributions and tax payments to the Alliance, while at the same time making use of Alliance infrastructure and trade benefits. It also opposed the limits to its defense forces imposed by the Alliance, but made no overt public challenge at this time. Commenor, Fondor, and Bespin had also began to drift away onto the path of rebellion. In secret, Corellia began building a fleet comparable to a planetary assault force, supplied by planets like Adumar that produced weapons in violation of Galactic Alliance law. Later on, a powergrab to save the Alliance from falling into utter chaos was led by Jacen Solo (AKA Darth Caedus) the acting supreme officer of the Galactic Alliance Guard. The Battle of Kashyyyk was a major blow to the Galactic Alliance. The New Jedi Order and Hapes Consortium seceded from the Alliance, removing twenty percent of the GA's fleet strength.

In this alternative ending, during the battle of Shedu Maad, Jaina Solo was unable to kill Darth Caedus, but was instead captured and imprisoned aboard the GAG Destroyer - The Anakin Solo.

You are the interrogator.
